The all-in-one platform to create, run, and grow your event business. Create your event Let's talk Helping events do business better At Events.com, we empower events, revolutionizing their business approach. Anyone can effortlessly create, explore, promote, and relish beloved events, enhancing every experience. We support organizers in crafting unforgettable attendee moments, boosting efficiency and generating fresh revenue streams. That magical juncture when these two worlds unite? It‚Äôs our ultimate aspiration. The Events.com team From two visionary minds to a team of global experts, the Events.com team powers millions of events. We fuse event tech, marketing, sponsorship and support to craft winning solutions, driven by collaboration and customer focus. Together, let‚Äôs reshape event management, leaving a mark on the industry. Our headquarters in‚Ä®La¬†Jolla, California With our headquarters nestled in the vibrant community of La Jolla, California, Events.com oversees a network of offices strategically situated across the globe, enabling us to provide dedicated support and services to event organizers worldwide. Learn more about events.com World class support Get help when you need it from our support team of event¬†experts. Contact support Careers Learn about career opportunities at¬†Events.com. Explore careers Press and media View our press releases, find our press kit and¬†more. View Press Careers At Events.com, we are committed to a people-centric culture. We know that a business isn‚Äôt possible without the happiness, health, success, and engagement of every team member. When you join Events.com, you‚Äôll quickly discover we‚Äôre more than an office, we are a family. We look forward to having you join us. Benefits + perks 401k Healthcare Paid sick days Unlimited time off Paid parental leave Competitive compensation 401k Healthcare Paid sick days Unlimited time off Paid parental leave Competitive compensation We‚Äôre honored to be awarded and recognized‚Ä®and are dedicated to upholding these principles. Join our team We‚Äôre a fast-paced tech company disrupting the events‚Ä®industry. Below are some open roles our team is looking to hire.‚Ä®Don‚Äôt see the right fit? No worries! Email us your resume at careers@events.com anyways and tell us a bit about why‚Ä®Events.com needs you on the team! See open positions Call or email us US: (858) 257-2300 Toll Free: +1 (888) 331-8269 Int: +1 (858) 257-2300 Email : hello@events.com Create an event Organizer Events.com Sell Events.com Promote Events.com Sponsor Events.com Execute Events.com Insights Events.com Virtual Events.com Live Pricing Event Goer Events.com Discover Experience | My Tickets Partner Calendar Referral Partner Program Trusted Partners Become a Sponsor Resources Contact Support Help Center Blog eBooks Brand Guide AI Event Tools Report | State of XR and AI Company About Us Press Investor Relations Newsletter AMEX Œî Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn ¬© 2025 Events.com - All Rights Reserved Terms Privacy Cookies Organizer Events.com Sell Events.com Promote Events.com Sponsor Events.com Execute Events.com Insights Events.com Virtual Events.com Live Pricing Event Goer Events.com Discover Experience | My Tickets Partner Calendar Referral Partner Program Trusted Partners Become a Sponsor Resources Contact Support Help Center Blog eBooks Brand Guide AI Event Tools Report | State of XR and AI Company About Us Press Investor Relations Newsletter AMEX Œî Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn Terms Privacy Cookies ¬© 2025 Events.com - All Rights Reserved

Festival and Event Staff Menu Events Events Forbidden Forest Download Festival Latitude Festival Camp Bestival Dorset Leeds Festival Reading Festival Watch About About Volunteer at Festivals Event Jobs Festival Volunteers Event Stewards Event Staff History Green Festival Feedback News Contact FAQ Community Community Facebook Group Videos Photos Newsletter Shop Apply We can help you recruit and manage your festival and event staff! Contact Us Festival and Event Staff Hotbox Events recruits and manages festival and event staff¬†for festivals across the UK. The first event we worked with¬†was Leeds Festival in 2003, since then we've grown from supplying a small team of just 6 staff¬†to over¬†three thousand stewards every year! If you run a festival or event and would lik e more information about the festival and event staff¬†Hotbox Events can provide please contact us . Our festival and event staffing experience Our management team has been recruiting and managing festival and event staff across the UK since the early 90s. We supply and manage teams of up to¬†900 at the¬†festivals we work with, helping in the campsites, on fire towers, gates, wristband exchanges, entrances and in the arenas. Festival and Event Staff Our festival and event staff services Our event teams provide support and customer service to festival and event goers, whilst working with other onsite agencies to help reduce crime and keep ticket holders safe. The key areas our festival and event staff assist with include: Working in campsites, arenas, on gates, fire towers, and wristband exchanges. Our staff are the eyes and ears of a festival or event; trained to be proactive and alert to any potential problem. Promoting crime awareness and crime prevention to the public. Working with onsite teams to ensure medical, fire and security issues are dealt with promptly and safely. Helping to prevent overcrowding and on hand to monitor crowd safety. Assisting the public to create an environment where they feel safe. Directing the public, assisting with ingress and egress to help the process run smoothly and effectively. Supporting ticket holders, providing information about the event including facilities and performances to ensure they have the best possible time at your event. Festival and event feedback We've received fantastic feedback from festival organisers and even the UK Police Force! You can find some of the feedback we've received on our festival and event feedback page. Festival and event staff¬†feedback We pride ourselves on both the service our festival and event staff provide and the enjoyable working environment we create for our festival and event staff. You can find feedback from our festival and event staff on our festival and event staff feedback page. Messenger If there is anything you would like to ask or you would just like to chat with us about our festival and event staff services, the easiest way is to... Connect with us on Messenger Socials You can¬†connect with us @hotboxevents on Instagram , Twitter , Facebook , and LinkedIn Watch festival and event staff interviews If you'd like to hear from some of our festival and event staff make sure you check out our festival and event staff interviews ! In our interviews you'll get to hear the experiences of festival and event¬†staff who have joined us, talking about how they found their shifts, how they were treated by the Hotbox Events team at the¬†festival and events they've worked at, taking on more responsibility year on year and progressing to new roles, and even how the experience and confidence gained¬†has helped with their career progression away from festival and events! Photos of festival and event staff Another way to take a look at our festival and event staff in action is to check out some of our¬†festival and event photos ! In our festival and event photo galleries, you will find thousands of photos covering our festival and event history over the past twenty years! Festival and event newsletter We usually send an email newsletter about once a month, if you would like to keep up to date you can subscribe ! Email If you would like to drop us an email its info@hotboxevents.com Phone You can reach our office by phone on the numbers below... Tel: 01252849600 (UK) select option 2 for Hotbox Events Tel: +441252849600 (International) select option 2 for Hotbox Events Zack I would love you guys to know that each year that I've worked for Hotbox, I've absolutely loved it! I would never do a festival as part of the general public ever again! read more Festival and Event Staff Festival and Event Staff Contact us Festival Merch Shop | Watch Interviews | Forbidden Forest | Download | Latitude | Bestival Dorset | Reading | Leeds | PAAM | Sitemap | Privacy | Contact ¬© 2025 Hotbox Events Ltd - all rights reserved. We prioritise your development, wellbeing, and experience every step of the way. Fortnightly Pay We believe in keeping things simple and stress-free. With fortnightly living-wage pay, you get paid faster and more frequently, giving you real financial control. Reward As a proud Living Wage employer, we believe your hard work deserves fair pay. We‚Äôre committed to ensuring everyone on our team earns a wage that reflects the value they bring. Development Joining Ethical Staffing means joining a team that invests in your future. From recognised certifications to practical on-the-job skills, we provide the tools you need to grow your career. Jun 28 Event Stewards ‚Äì National Bell Ringing Competition 2025 No More Applications May 23 - Jun 1 Event Stewards ‚Äì Steve Backshall Live 2025 No More Applications May 24 - May 25 Event Stewards ‚Äì Love Saves the Day 2025 No More Applications Jul 16 - Aug 17 Car Park Marshalls ‚Äì Dean Forest Railway 2025 (Wed 16th July ‚Äì Sun 17th August) No More Applications What roles do you offer? We offer a range of different roles, depending on the needs of our partners. At events , our most common roles include box office, stewarding, hospitality and customer service roles. Our non event roles range from front of house, barista, catering and logistics positions. Have a look at our events pages to see what roles suit your skills, interests and availability best. What sectors do you support? Ethical Staffing work with a hugely diverse range of clients; Conferences, Sporting Events, Brand activations, World Heritage events, University Graduations, and of course, Live Events and Festivals. We are proud to state that our client portfolio is as diverse as our staffing teams! What is the application process? Want to join our superstar team? First you‚Äôll need to fill out an application form on our recruitment portal. Here you can tell us about your experience & what events you‚Äôre interested in. One of our recruitment team will then arrange to have a telephone or Zoom interview with you, and if successful we will set you up on our shift allocation system where you will be able to choose any roles that you are interested in working at, and be the first to find out about exciting new openings! Learn more here. Can I work with my friends? Absolutely! The more the merrier! We can‚Äôt guarantee that your shifts / roles will align, but we can do our very best to make it work. Please ensure you mention this when you are contacted by our team at HQ to book in your work. What's in it for me? We truly take pride in supporting our your wellbeing and happiness! At an event, this includes free tea and coffee, snacks and around the clock support from our awesome team of managers. For weekend camping events you will also get perks like a free meal ticket for each shift worked, access to a dedicated crew camping area with hot showers, phone charging points and lots more! ‚ÄúJust wanted to say thanks to you and the team for today. I‚Äôve worked with various agencies at events/festivals before and this was by far the most enjoyable experience. You have a really nice team and I felt valued and trusted‚Äù - Leanne, ES Crew 2022 "Working with Ethical Staffing has given me confidence and helped build my people skills. I spent the summer working at the most awesome festivals and events in the UK!" - Gary, ES Crew 2022 Services EXPLORE Roles EXPLORE Purpose Driven Staffing Solutions Location Kambe House 34 Portland Square Bristol BS2 8RG Useful Links FAQ‚Äôs Meet The Team Privacy Environmental Policy Email Us team@ethicalstaff.co.uk Call Us 0117 462 2579 Ethical Event Staffing LTD. Company registration number: 09549843 ¬© All content Ethical Staffing Group 2025. About Us - The Festival Company Skip to main content Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search Menu Home About Us Services Events Extreme Mudfest A Night For NICU Lifted LaunchPad Story News Contact facebook pinterest instagram About Us Allow us to introduce ourselves and share with you a little bit about what we offer, what we do, and how we do it better than everyone else. Our Values Our Specialty Creating lifetime memories through large-scale events, talent curation, gatherings, and festivals, with a key focus on the brand and client we are serving. 01 Our Approach It‚Äôs simple. We are a ‚Äòhospitality first‚Äô company, creating unforgettable memories and experiences for the people we bring together. 02 Our Magic We tailor our experiences to the psychographic of the clientele we serve, setting our events apart from all the rest. We bring like-minded people together, with one common goal where everyone wins together. 03 Our Mission Our mission is your success. The reward is the celebration. 04 Our Impact Our music events are always free to children. Our events are always 100% accessible. We always give local artists a chance to shine on our stages. We always leave money in the communities we serve. 05 Event Services From the idea to the show, The Festival Company works with you to make your wildest festival thoughts and ambitions come true. Our team is capable of working with you to create your brand, book your talent, and produce your event in the most efficient and cost-effective way possible. Learn More Talent Buying Event Production Event Consulting Business Consulting Marketing Design Why We Exist We exist because we wanted to create a company that we wish existed when we started our first festival. We wanted a company that provided guidance, service, expertise and solved all of those little pain points that we didn‚Äôt even know existed until they did. We wished there was a partner out there that was actually a partner ‚Äì someone that was affordable, who we could grow with, and who really cared about our business as much as we did. We couldn‚Äôt find it, so we set out to create it. As we‚Äôve grown, we‚Äôve seen what music and events can really do for people and it‚Äôs our mission to make events and music accessible to everyone. ‚ÄúWe may operate in the entertainment business, but we are in the hospitality and service business to our core. Our goal is to elevate experience, one fan at a time, while making it a priority to leave an impact in the communities we serve. Our events will always be accessible to people with all levels of ability, we will always allow kids, we will always give local artists an opportunity to shine on our stages and we will always give back to the community. Music heals in more ways than one and our mission is to ensure everyone can be touched by it.‚Äù ‚Äì Billie Jo Aasen If you can dream it, we can do it. We are a team of creators, so when you‚Äôre ready, book a call , and let‚Äôs start turning your dreams into reality. The Festival Company (TFC) is a Canadian owned and operated company, specializing in building communities all over the globe through niche market brands, festivals and concert touring. Come Join The Team! APPLY Who is Event Pros NW? Event Pros NW, a division of TCB Management Group ¬†is an industry leader in Event Staffing & Security.¬† We are not your "typical" staffing company who is focused on quantity before quality, in fact we prefer to stay a mid size provider, so we can maintain the quality that we are respected for. At Event Pros NW we recognize that YOU are our biggest asset and we value the contributions you make to our mutual success.¬† ¬†We seek team members who want to grow with our company and who add value to our overall success.¬† Event Pros is often called a family because we care about each of our team members and respect their individuality. Event Pros NW is an excellent choice for those who enjoy providing excellent customer service and who like to help create a fun and safe environment for event goers.¬† ¬†If you are looking for occasional work that allows you to self schedule and choose when and where you work, this may be just the fit! ‚Äã Come learn what it means to be a¬† " Partner in Excellence " ‚Äã Call us to learn more at 541-574-2820 ‚Äã Essential Job Functions Apply Now! Application Process Call A Recruiter What Employees Say What is: "Partners in Excellence" A variety of work opportunities: ‚Äã Event Security Ticket Sellers & Takers Alcohol Monitors Parking Staff Ushers Guest Services Bag Checkers & More... Benefits to joining out team: ‚Äã ‚Äã Above Industry Standard Wages Work All Over The State Hotels When You Travel Get To Attend Fun Events Flexible Hours Self Scheduling Bonuses Employee Events College Tuition Discount for you and your family. Pay Rates: $17.00 to 24.50 / Hour Some of The Events We Work What do our employees say about working with¬†us? I am honored to tell you about my experience working with the TCB Event Staff Team. Although I would call it more of a family. This is my third year working with them. I have found out that they are dedicated to top notch service and they also give you many opportunities for personal growth and development. Between the Management and trainers they have many levels of training for your needed certifications. From First Aid, CPR, to OLCC and Dpsst training to crowd control. Plus the events we work are alot of fun from Monster truck shows, to rodeos, sporting events, and concerts it gives you a wide variety of things to see and hear. If you like the the freedom to schedule your time and also give you the chance to see alot of different areas this is the place to work. ‚Äã J. Waver ‚Äã "This will be my fourth year working for TCB now. TCB is awesome because there's an amazing bond of teamwork, you can connect with your supervisors they're hard workers who are working out there right alongside you, they provide top-notch quality services, and it's also just so thrilling interacting with so many types of people and super satisfying at the end of the day knowing how many people you'v helped. Plus, it's a fun way to earn extra cash over the weekends. ‚Äã G. Helland TCB is more than just event staff and security. It‚Äôs a company that creates memories, you pick what events you want to work. Anything from concerts to food festivals you choose it. Giving you the best of both worlds, making sure everyone is safe and also having fun. C. Landrom My experience with TCB has been wonderful.¬† In the time that I have been employed the staff was very welcoming and¬†helpful with their training. It has always been an extremely professional environment, and the support from supervisors and staff has always been phenomenal.¬† Though the work can be a bit "rough" at times, it is clear how much hard work is valued among everyone as a team. I would compare TCB to a vacation you get paid to go to. Really great company to work for. ‚Äã A. Rodregez Honestly I don‚Äôt even know where to begin with this, but let‚Äôs start with ‚Äúthank you‚Äù! Getting this job has been a huge blessing as a high schooler because it‚Äôs by far the most flexible job in the planet. It‚Äôs awesome that you get to choose when you work but what makes it even better is the people. I have always hated working with negative people and so far at all the events I have worked at everyone and I mean everyone is crazy and fun and enjoyable to work along side. I can‚Äôt wait to move up the ranks and get to experience everything this company has to offer because every job is a new opportunity with new people and well who knows what could happen!! ‚Äã N. Moan It's a great feeling to help keep our community events safe while seeing a little of some great events. Scheduling your own hours is a huge plus. ‚Äã T. Geer Recruiter: (541) 574-2820 jobs@tcbmanagement.com Employee Login Supervisor Login bottom of page

Stop by¬†Booth 242¬†to connect with our team, learn how we spotlight culture-first curators, and see how we‚Äôre powering unforgettable, community-driven event experiences. Whether you're producing events, building your brand, or championing Black-owned platforms, this is the perfect space to collaborate and grow.

Let‚Äôs talk strategy, impact, and what‚Äôs next for the future of experiential culture.

üîó Learn more at https://lnkd.in/gJ28SZjp 2 Like Comment Share Eventnoire 2,237 followers 1mo Report this post Just one week left until the Umu Igbo Unite Corporation 21st Annual Convention kicks off in Dallas (August 7-10, 2025)! As proud partners, we urge you not to miss this unparalleled opportunity.

This year's agenda is packed with dynamic sessions, including the Careers Expo, Pitch Competition, UIUTalk, and numerous networking opportunities designed to foster professional growth and cultural connection. Swipe through to view the comprehensive schedule and plan your experience.

Join over 1,500 professionals for 'Maka Obodo Anyi: For the Growth of Our Community.'

Final call to register: https://lnkd.in/eGqikg-u #UIUConvention2025 #UmuIgboUnite #UIUConventionPartner #UIUPartner #MakaObodoAnyi #IgboDiaspora #ProfessionalDevelopment #CommunityGrowth #DallasEvents #Eventnoire 1 1 Comment Like Comment Share Eventnoire 2,237 followers 3mo Edited Report this post A major moment for our team.¬†üôåüèæüåç

We‚Äôre proud to celebrate our Co-Founder & CEO, Jeffrey Osuji , as he represents¬†Eventnoire¬†and the power of Black creativity on the global stage at¬†Cannes Lions 2025.

Jeff will be joined by two visionary leaders:
Carlo Murison, CEO & Chief Creative Officer, Twotone Global
Sandra Amachree, Head of Communications ‚Äì Marketing, Nigerian Breweries PLC

Together, they‚Äôll lead an inspiring meet up and workshop  titled
‚ÄúAfrica: The Future of Certainty. A Meet-Up with Africa‚Äôs Creative Leaders,‚Äù
diving into how African influence is shaping global storytelling, innovation, and branding.

üìÜ Tuesday, June 17 | 4PM CST
 üìç Global Creative Hub, Rotonde
 üéü RSVP: https://lnkd.in/efvdhdki We couldn‚Äôt be more proud to see our leader shine and share the vision behind Eventnoire ‚Äî a platform built to elevate culture, community, and creativity.

Heading to Cannes?
